title: Ticket #1015: USER_JOB_WRAPPER and no file transfer broken
description:
1. Have a USER_JOB_WRAPPER (Hey, CS does. Handy!).
  2. Submit this job: 
    universe=vanilla
executable=/bin/sleep
arguments=3
notification=never
log=eraseme.log
should_transfer_files=yes
when_to_transfer_output=on_exit
queue
  3. Observe that the job runs as expected.
  4. Submit this job: 
    universe=vanilla
executable=/bin/sleep
arguments=3
notification=never
log=eraseme.log
queue
  5. Observe that the job goes on hold with an error something like: 
    007 (9920.000.000) 11/30 17:26:39 Shadow exception!
        Error from slot1@p22.cs.wisc.edu: Failed to execute '/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper' with arguments 3: No such file or directory
        0  -  Run Bytes Sent By Job
        0  -  Run Bytes Received By Job
...
012 (9920.000.000) 11/30 17:26:39 Job was held.
        Error from slot1@p22.cs.wisc.edu: Failed to execute '/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper' with arguments 3: No such file or directory
        Code 6 Subcode 2
...

Checking the remote logs, indeed the starter is trying to run "/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper 3" instead of "/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper condor_exec.exe 3" as expected.
remarks:
2009-Dec-02 10:01:45 by gthain:
This isn't really a bug, except perhaps with the error message. From the starterlog: 

11/30 17:26:39 IWD: /scratch/adesmet/rust/admin-20012
11/30 17:26:39 Input file: /dev/null
11/30 17:26:39 Output file: /dev/null
11/30 17:26:39 Error file: /dev/null
11/30 17:26:39 Renice expr "5" evaluated to 5
11/30 17:26:39 Using wrapper /unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper to exec 3
11/30 17:26:39 Env = _CONDOR_SLOT=1 _CONDOR_MACHINE_AD=/scratch/condor/execute/dir_2407/.machine.ad _CONDOR_SCRATCH_DIR=/scra
tch/condor/execute/dir_2407 _CONDOR_JOB_AD=/scratch/condor/execute/dir_2407/.job.ad _CONDOR_WRAPPER_ERROR_FILE=/scratch/condo
r/execute/dir_2407/.job_wrapper_failure
11/30 17:26:39 ENFORCE_CPU_AFFINITY not true, not setting affinity
11/30 17:26:39 Create_Process: Cannot access specified cwd "/scratch/adesmet/rust/admin-20012": errno = 2 (No such file or di
rectory)
11/30 17:26:39 ERROR "Create_Process(/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper,3, ...) failed: No such file or directory" at l
ine 530 in file os_proc.cpp
11/30 17:26:39 ShutdownFast all jobs.

So, without filetransfer on, the execute node is trying to cd to the cwd of the submitter, which doesn't exit, and the CreateProcess fails.

2009-Dec-02 15:56:08 by adesmet:
Re-opening.

  1. This doesn't explain the profoundly suspicious "Create_Process(/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper,3, ...)" where one would expect "Create_Process(/unsup/condor/etc/cs_cluster_job_wrapper,condor_exec.exe,3, ...)" or similar.

  2. The error message should be improved.

2010-May-15 11:38:31 by matt: 
echo "cmd=/bin/sleep\nargs=1m\nremote_initialdir=/tmp/nope\nnotification=never\nqueue" | condor_submit

Before... 

05/15 09:24:02 IWD: /tmp/nope
05/15 09:24:02 Using wrapper /home/matt/Documents/Condor/Installation/wrapper.sh to exec 1m
05/15 09:24:02 Create_Process: Cannot access specified iwd "/tmp/nope": errno = 2 (No such file or directory)
05/15 09:24:02 ERROR "Create_Process(/home/matt/Documents/Condor/Installation/wrapper.sh,1m, ...) failed: Cannot access specified iwd "/tmp/nope" (errno=2: 'No such file or directory')" at line 542 in file os_proc.cpp

After... 

05/15 09:36:23 IWD: /tmp/nope
05/15 09:36:23 Using wrapper /home/matt/Documents/Condor/Installation/wrapper.sh to exec /bin/sleep 1m
05/15 09:36:23 Create_Process: Cannot access specified iwd "/tmp/nope": errno = 2 (No such file or directory)
05/15 09:36:23 ERROR "Create_Process(/home/matt/Documents/Condor/Installation/wrapper.sh,/bin/sleep 1m, ...) failed: Cannot access specified iwd "/tmp/nope" (errno=2: 'No such file or directory')" at line 541 in file os_proc.cpp

This is an improvement on two counts, 1) the normal "Using wrapper" message, 2) ERROR message
check_ins: 2010-May-15 11:39   Check-in [18006]: Improved log messages about what is being exec'd when using user job wrapper (#1015) (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: adesmet
